page.title: 15A DAY AS A FILM EXTRA.
page.content: I must be mad doing this-time of arrival being 6.30am.Standing in one queue to be checked in another to claim our costumes.Then to the marquee to change and another queue to be checked.Even more queues to have mud plastered on our faces.Jumped on to a bus,yet to be faced with a queue for breakfast.Spent the morning being told by one director to do one thing and another something else."Lunch time" (funnily enough another queue). Afternoon-much the same as the morning but more boring.Feeling a right idiot having to mime because the horse did not like noise.Back to base camp-more queues to hand in the costumes and collect our earnings!Was it worth it?-Yes,if I'm seen in the film.
